website_summaries.verdict: A large, well-made shower cap that keeps your hair dry and looks great too.
pros: Won't leave a mark on your forehead
cons: This cap is too large for some

customer_reviews.title: Not mold resistant as claimed
customer_reviews.text: The shower cap did it's purpose, however I bought it for long term and it did get moldy eventually and I threw it out. I'm giving it 1 star because false advertisement SUCKS. Mold resistant? Nope!
customer_reviews.author: Buttstallion

customer_reviews.title: Not actually large
customer_reviews.text: This barely/nearly covers my edges when my hair is stretched. I can't imagine doing more than covering half if it was curly. Though higher quality than my current cap it's too small Update- My rating went from 3 to 1. It is less than a year later and all the elastic is gone. I have to safety pin it to use it. My last cap lasted years. Would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, and fits well even with medium length hair.
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap was exactly as expected. It was large enough to hold medium length hair, cute, and well made. See photos for my hair length. I'm glad I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Traecy

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Too small and I don't have a large head or big hair. Thought it would stretch out but I have had it for a while. Comes down over your face the whole time you are using it. Don't buy this.
customer_reviews.author: brandylee

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for big heads 😆😆
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head 😂😂 Around my hair line edges, they would always get wet but with this shower cap, nothe a problem anymore! I think it's so cute too!
customer_reviews.author: Stickie

customer_reviews.title: A little too tight. Maybe I have a big head...
customer_reviews.text: It's a really nice shower cap, and I was glad to find it since there's not much selection at the stores. That said, it's pretty tight and sometimes snaps down over my eyes. I'm hoping it will loosen up a bit over time.
customer_reviews.author: Love Alfie

customer_reviews.title: Great, but word of caution
customer_reviews.text: This is a great shower cap. Inexpensive but quality. It's thick, but not uncomfortable. The elastic that keeps the cap tight to your head is pretty tight, but it keeps the water from getting in there. Word to the wise: Don't use this right before leaving the house. A red line will appear on your forehead from the elastic. Takes a little to disappear.
customer_reviews.author: Monica

customer_reviews.title: Probably great if you have a large head
customer_reviews.text: I have a smallish head and this cap just doesn't work. Even with my hair in a bun at the top of my head which would cause a normal shower cap to ride high and not cover the bottom of my hair in the back, this thing slipped down over my eyes within seconds. See picture, eek! The fabric is much nicer than plastic shower caps and I wish it worked. Maybe better for someone with a large head or very fluffy curly hair that could prop it up off your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: Robyn M

customer_reviews.title: Big disappointment~
customer_reviews.text: I thought this was the cutest shower cap and looked to be pretty secure when I first saw it online and ordered it. Unfortunately, it has proven to be a major let down! I have short hair and WITHOUT EXCEPTION, when I come out of the shower and take it off, the bottom back and top front of my hair is sopping wet. I don’t how this happens because nothing is exposed when I put it on. I’ve tried tweaking it a bunch of ways, to NO avail. As cute as this looks, I just can’t recommend it! For me, it’s one step short of wearing no shower cap at all.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Bakst

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too tight.
customer_reviews.text: Well the dots are certainly cute and it was waterproof and tight enough that if doing a hair mask, it keeps the drips in pretty well. The issue I have is that it's too tight. I'm talking deep red line around my head and a headache after just a shower. It is too uncomfortable for daily use but I'm going to try to tweak it so it's not a waste. I don't feel like I have a big head as I'm all around petite.
customer_reviews.author: WJML

customer_reviews.title: Unhappy
customer_reviews.text: Double layer lets water leak in between which creates bacteria and smells bad. Cannot wash it either as you can never get the in between layer dry again. Used vinegar and bleach, did not work. 2nd time I purchased this, first time it took about a year to happen, so was ok with that. But this time, it only took a week.
customer_reviews.author: ZerepM

customer_reviews.title: So tight!
customer_reviews.text: I don’t think I have a particularly big head, but this thing is so tight that when I used it for a deep conditioning treatment, I ended up having an indentation in my forehead for the rest of the day. It may have even still been noticeable the next day. Way too tight!
customer_reviews.author: Nicki Wells

customer_reviews.title: Elastic way too tight!
customer_reviews.text: This was my second purchase. I LOVED the first one and it lasted about 2 years, until the elastic broke. So I just re-ordered the same one from the same seller. This one came and OMG, the elastic was so tight around my head and uncomfortable. I even tried to stretch it out overnight, but it just went back to its small size. Since I liked the first one, I'm buying another one (with a different pattern) to see if that was a fluke. If not, I will leave a one star rating and move on to find a better product. :( Update: Bought different pattern -- SAME PROBLEM. Time to move on.
customer_reviews.author: Alfazoid

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Went back to my drugstore shower cap. Used this for about 10 days and NEVER had a good experience. Oddly enough, even though the elastic is too tight, the back of my head (neck) got wet every time no matter how I adjusted it Today I noticed a nasty smell coming from it. Ewwww.... A lot of money for a truly inferior product.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reduce, Reuse, in Style!
customer_reviews.text: I'm cutting down in plastic in my house but love, love, love shower caps. Glad I found this reusable shower cap! It does all the shower cap things that the disposable shower caps do, like keep my hair dry during showers and out of my face during mud masks. Ran it through the laundry once and came out looking like new. It's a little big and poufy so it will hold giant hairdos and long hair. But it still fits snug, and doesn't leave elastic marks on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: Nukegrrrl

customer_reviews.title: Way too big
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a larger shower cap as most of the ones in the stores are too small to hold my hair and keep it dry. I had high hopes for this one given all of the other reviews however it was the opposite end of the spectrum. this was soo large when I tried it on that it fell over my eyes and would not have kept my hair inside it dry. Had to return it and will continue to look for the perfect one for me
customer_reviews.author: Calinan

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: My old shower cap was too small and too loose, but my Betty Dain Fashionista is perfect. I love the extra space for my long hair pony tail and the extra row of elastic to hold my hair while securing those pesky little short hairs. I am no longer worried about this shower cap falling off in the shower. I highly reccomend this shower cap. Very cute and also practical and thoughtfully designed.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: cute, cute, cute, cute
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is sooooo cute!! I bought it because it was cute and the price was right. When I put it on....super cute, plenty of room and does the job. It comes all the way to my eyebrows when I pull it down. It also has enough room to hold a 7-8 afro or ponytail on the top of my head, with a little room to spare. I have natural 4A hair, so that's a pretty big ponytail! My hair stays completely dry, all sides and did I mention it was cute? Yeah, well it is.
customer_reviews.author: elise johnson

customer_reviews.title: It's just okay
customer_reviews.text: Gets the job done (keeps hair in it dry), plenty of room for hair. The top, however, is so big that if i don't put my hair up in a large clip so that it's tall on my head the shower cap rides down to my eyes and won't stay up at hairline. Other issue is that it leaves marks from the elastic so don't take a long shower with it or you'll have lines all day!
customer_reviews.author: emb97

customer_reviews.title: Perfect/ excellent quality and so pretty
customer_reviews.text: Perfect- great quality Used last night for shower and also to protect my hair while applying face tanner
customer_reviews.author: JA

customer_reviews.title: but is pretty tight around my head
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, but is pretty tight around my head. I wouldn't say I have a large head by any means, but each time I use this it leaves a deep, red mark along my scalp. It is fine for quick showers, but I can't wear it for much longer than 10-15 minutes without it becoming uncomfortable. The pattern is fun and bright, and it seems to be of good quality, though!
customer_reviews.author: Julia Hedrick

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Cap
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cap back in early 2019, wore it once, it looked funny and I already had a favorite one I wore all the time. I ordered a back up one and still have not used it. THIS ONE is terrific. It hold my hair in (I have thick med. length hair), keeps it all dry and does not interfere with the large clips I hold my hair with. It is so easy to put on, I am VERY happy with this cap. I let it dry after each use and will wash by hand once a month or so. Great buy !
customer_reviews.author: TMAC TexasTop Contributor: Watches

customer_reviews.title: Did not work for me
customer_reviews.text: Seems like a good quality product but the cap itself is way too big. I normally have a larger head and even this was too big for me. Would be fine for someone who has really long hair. The elastic on this is also extremely tight, gave me a headache and left marks on my forehead.
customer_reviews.author: No

customer_reviews.title: Tight on my Head
customer_reviews.text: I love using shower caps so I can shower frequently without having to wash and style my hair each time. This is a super cute cap, but it is very tight on my head. My head is actually on the smaller size for an adult woman so I was surprised how tight this cap was. I think it's the way it is shaped with a thick band. If you are sensitive to a tight band around your head, you might want to give this a pass. It's very cute, but not comfortable. Perhaps for a child.
customer_reviews.author: Quichemarie

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap I've ever personally used
customer_reviews.text: Now, it's not like I've used TONS of different shower caps, but this one feels like it's a really great option, and I'm not sure what there would be to improve on its quality. I have had other, flimsier shower caps in the past, mostly for trying to do any special treatments or coloring on my hair. THIS one is great because it is a thicker material, has a better quality elastic to go around your head so it doesn't slip off so easily, and also has plenty of room if you have a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Mallory B

customer_reviews.title: Very nice shower cap
customer_reviews.text: Before I bought this cap I thought they all were like the cheap ones from drug stores, etc. This one is much nicer. I think the elastic is loose and I have a large head. I bought this so that I could put conditioner on my hair in the shower and leave it on while I bathe. When I'm through, I rinse the shower cap and hang it to dry. I bought the deco dots. Maybe some of the patterns are made bigger than the others. No problems and no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: jec

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortably small
customer_reviews.text: I had another shower cap from this brand that lasted years but it was time for a new one so I bought this without hesitation. I am surprised by all of the good reviews because this cap is so small, it does cover my hair (straight and only shoulder length) but there’s no extra room and the elastic is so tight it was very uncomfortable even for a 5 minute shower, and I don’t have a large head. I’ll try it a few more times to see if it stretches out but next time I buy a new one I’ll definitely be looking elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel F.

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and secure - but leaves a line on your forehead
customer_reviews.text: The designs offered are a little more eccentric than I usually go for, but the shower cap itself is very durable and designed in a way that provides extra room for your hair. Ever get all your hair in a bun and then your shower cap won't cover it all? Then get this one! The elastic is great and keeps the water out, though it's a little tight on my head (granted - I have a slightly large head) so it leaves a line around my forehead for about an hour after using. Goes away by the time I get to work in the morning.
customer_reviews.author: Rachael Rinehart

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had it for a long time, so can't comment on how well it will hold up over time, but so far it's perfect. I wear it in the shower so that I don't have to wash my hair every single day. For a shower cap, I think it's pretty comfortable. Not too tight, but still seals things off so that the water can't get in. It was only $6.95 when I purchased it, so a great price. UPDATE: I was able to use it for about a year before the elastic wore out and I needed to purchase a new one. This time I decided to go for the, which seems nicer. I also much prefer the pattern.
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Great shower cap, stays in place on my head, keeps the water out and is water resistant! Over all VERY pleased with this purchase. Wish they had other colors or patterns. Polka dots aren't my thing, but hey its just for shower use, so who cares!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Jones

customer_reviews.title: Works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: With colour treated hair I try not to wash it every day so this shower cap has come in handy. I have a lot of hair and a rather large head (thanks, Dad...) and this fits comfortably and easily. No water gets in and I hang it on my towel rack to dry. We have a rather "damp" bathroom but I've not noticed any mold or mildew forming on it like other brands. Overall I'm very pleased with this purchase and would consider buying another for travel purposes.
customer_reviews.author: HMW

customer_reviews.title: Elastic Doesn't Allow Water In...Elastic Indentation Included
customer_reviews.text: Does what a shower cap should but the plastic used is a little stiff which is okay but the elastic is so rough against my forehead. It leaves the elastic mark on my forehead when wearing for only a 10 minute shower. I am back to disposable shower caps bc the elastic indentations take too long to go away, and I dont want to look like I've had a pair of tight drawers over my head all night!
customer_reviews.author: ButterflySmoke

customer_reviews.title: The elastic band doesn't last long...
customer_reviews.text: I like this shower cap, but the band doesn't last long. I have bought it twice. They both broke after about 5-6 months... I guess that's worth the price already... The cap is still fine. I like the material.its very thick and water resistant. So i changed the elastic band with a much better quality one, now it works. It will last longer for sure. Hope the producer can see it and improve it.
customer_reviews.author: A. X.

customer_reviews.title: Best quality shower cap ive used in these last 4 yrs
customer_reviews.text: So far, the best shower cap I have used. I keep buying different varieties from Marshall’s, TJ Maxx, and even other cheaper varieties from Amazon. Nothing is as sturdy or as large as this one. I think it is better to spend money on this one, then to buy smaller and less durable shower caps which cost less, but not as useful. Elastic is great, and material is thick, size accommodates v long hair as well
customer_reviews.author: phoenixkid

customer_reviews.title: Elastic breaks easily
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time I purchase this item and the elastic broke the first and also the second time around. I only used it for about a week and it already became useless. I chose this product because I have thick curly hair and this is the only shower cap that fits all my hair but the quality is not good at all. It sucks because not only does it work for me but I also love the design and color. Unfortunately, I will not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Adri S.

customer_reviews.title: Really good quality
customer_reviews.text: So it might seem silly to get excited about a simple product such as a shower cap but honestly there are so many bad products out there that when I finally find a good one I love to share it. This shower cap fits snugly and has extra room so my large hair clip fits in easily without creating a gap. Its made of nice thick vinyl and I think the polka dots are simply sweet! Works very well and does all it should do. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Elli Jacey

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I’ve ordered several of these. Nice and large. Big enough to cover a head full of medium sized rollers. The elastic is sturdy so it doesn’t lose its shape. It has help up well over many months of use.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Scratchy, but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: I gave this 4 stars only because the rim of the cap is super scratchy. It irritates my hairline all the way around if I leave it on too long. Otherwise, it’s great for the price. Just don’t be expected to be blown away.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: FINALLY! An actual shower cap!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been looking for years for shower caps that were the same quality as the ones Avon once carried. It’s large enough for me (thin, medium-length hair), however, that isn’t the reason why I purchased it. I needed a good quality, strong plastic cap with a cotton band that didn’t unravel in a week. It’s not a satin-lined cap which I didn’t need either. No water comes under that band and I’m 2.5 months in. The others may as well be conditioner caps. Now my friends and family want in!
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend.  You won't be disappointed.  Great price for the quality.
customer_reviews.text: This lasted exactly 2 years. I wore it 4-5 x a week, every week. The elastic is what finally gave out by stretching, but that is to be expected since any brand elastic will break down after awhile. It was neither too snug nor too loose around my head and always kept my hair dry. I would put my long hair in a loose half-flipped pony with a thin headband over my bangs to keep them inside the cap. The price is outstanding considering all the wear I gave it. I definitely would purchase this again, and I did! Highly recommend. You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carpe Diem Lise

customer_reviews.title: Shower cap to cap them all
customer_reviews.text: Pros: extends time between wash’s of hair drys fast. Love the bow and colors. Cons: really tight and I have a small head. Leaves large red line on forehead - don’t use if you’re leaving to go out.
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: No Stupid Ruffles!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower cap! It's made of a nice, solid plastic (unlike the cheap ones you'd buy in the drugstore). The best part for me was no stupid, annoying ruffles around the rim! It goes on one's head easily with a solid elastic band inside and keeps my hair out of the water while washing my face or taking a shower or bath. I highly recommend buying this!
customer_reviews.author: Olive Oyl

customer_reviews.title: Love this Colorful Shower Cap! 😀
customer_reviews.text: I love this cap! It’s perfect for protecting my hair from the water. I love the colors and the box it came in is perfect for storage and or traveling purposes. There’s only ONE thing I don’t like about the product. The stretchy pink part of the cap leaves a line on my forehead because it’s a little too tight. I assume that with constant and continued use it will loosen up. Even with that, it’s still a great product and I would purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Shamika

customer_reviews.title: Fits over a lot of hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have a small head and this cap is still tight but it works great and has a lot of hair capacity. I have longish hair (to my bra strap) and I struggle to find a shower cap that holds all my hair, is functional, and doesn’t have a ruffle around my face. I HATE the ruffle...it always gets in the way of washing my face. So glad I found this shower cap. More color choices would be nice.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Works like it should
customer_reviews.text: Works great for it's purpose. It has plenty of room for ym curly hair in it. My only issue is that the elastic is kinda right on my head ( now I may have a large head but it's not freakish lol). It is waterproof and good quality
customer_reviews.author: Crissys2angels

customer_reviews.title: Good for big hair or big heads, but elastic endurance could be better.
customer_reviews.text: I have a lot of hair, and this cap covers at all. I just ordered my second one, because the elastic band went on the first one after about 10 months of regular use. Does the trick and is so much better than those hotel plastic caps!
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Would absolutely purchase again!
customer_reviews.text: As a daily or weekly shower cap for a lady it’s simply spectacular. Nice bright colors, good elastic band and the pink bow is a perfect touch. Sorry no picture to add but the stock photo is dead on. Highly recommend this polka dot pattern to enhance your shower experience. Thanks for reading. ~BBE PS - update after a year all seems in good shape. very durable. absolutely recommend
customer_reviews.author: BBE

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I wash my hair every couple days so this is perfect to keep my hair dry in the shower daily. I have a short a-line bob hair cut so it can fit my longer hair in the front. It is stretchy and just tight enough to keep my hair entirely dry and it is also comfortable. This shower cap has lasted so much longer than the cheaper ones I get at department stores that can tear and become loose easily.
customer_reviews.author: Sopah

customer_reviews.title: Gets a sour smell immediately
customer_reviews.text: Upon first use I loved these: plenty of room for all my shoulder length, normal, fine hair. It kept out all water and moisture. But within a week, it started getting a sour odor so I had to throw it out. I think the design holds water. This is the most exensive shower cap I have ever bought. The ones I've used that cost half this price or less last me at least 2 months. Will not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: discerningwoman

customer_reviews.title: Just right... *or so I thought
customer_reviews.text: *UPDATE: The elastic broke. I always store my cap on a rounded hook to dry, like I've done any other shower cap. The problem is, when I went to put it on one day, it looked stretched & wonky. As it turns out, the elastic had broken! This cap only lasted a year, with normal use; therefore, I can't recommend it. -3 stars* Roomy enough to hold all of my hair, even when it's piled on top of my head. The cap fits snugly and securely while still being comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: tikcay

customer_reviews.title: For all my big head folks, this is it!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking and looking for a great shower cap and I believe I’ve found it! It keeps my ears covered so it doesn’t get wet in the shower. I have very long hair so I put it in a ponytail and then clip it on the top of my head. I put this shower cap over my head, with the clip, and it covers it all. Amazing! I also have to admit that I have a big head so for it to cover my head plus a clip on top, it is a wondrous thing. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Rose

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for lots of hair!
customer_reviews.text: I have long, thick hair that I tend to wear in a high bun. Most shower caps, even the ones that claim to be a large size, don't cover my hair completely, leading to water getting in. This shower cap covers it all and then some! My hair doesn't get wet when using it, except a little in the back when I don't pull it down far enough. I use it ever other day and it hasn't developed a mildew smell like ones I've used in the past have.
customer_reviews.author: Mget

customer_reviews.title: YOUR EDGES WILL GET WET
customer_reviews.text: It does a good job with covering your hair but water seeps through the back of your neck. If you get your body wet in the back, and bend down to wash your legs or something, water will get underneath the back and get the perimeter of your hair wet in the back by your neck.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Thumbs up
customer_reviews.text: I have used once. I bought the super cheap ones and they do okay but I have to replace them every so often. Got one that was super stuff and didn’t like it. This is comfortable and fits my head and hair well. I do have a small head so I was concerned on the size. Compared to others, my hair isn’t ridiculously thick so idk if this would work for someone who does. I even clip my hair back and it fits it all no problem. Cute print too!
customer_reviews.author: Angelica

customer_reviews.title: Not so great for more than a year
customer_reviews.text: I loved this shower cap for the first few months I had it. Then the elastic in the band completely melted and became unusable. I was very upset since I liked it so much. To try and save it I bought some ribbon, took out the previous band (there was a huge gross mess of melted adhesive on the inside) and made a new binding with a ribbon tie to secure it around my hair. It has worked very well, but having to 'hack' products for longevity is disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: I love this adorable cap!
customer_reviews.text: This cap is so pretty. I was impressed by the lovely design and dainty bow in front. It's very accomodating for my hair whether I have it in a bun, or just tied back by giving a lot of allowance for space. I've used it many times and my hair NEVER comes out wet. It's lasts a long time after many washes! The design does not wear off by any means. It stays pretty through all your showers. Love this cap and look forward to getting more.
customer_reviews.author: MM Ramos

customer_reviews.title: Works well, very tight
customer_reviews.text: Great reusable shower cap. Definitely works. The elastic band is a little tighter than I'm used to, so it kinda hurts me after a few minutes, but I only use it to shower so it's fine. I like that it's big enough to comfortable contain my mid-back length hair and a clip holding the hair up.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay O.

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: This product is decent, it protects the hair from water BUT it is not flexible so the hair at the back of your neck tends to peak out as well as by your ears. Also this product leaves a dent in my skin for a while even with a short shower. So generally after my shower there is a dent in my forehead but at least 95% of my hair is still dry!
customer_reviews.author: Abbi

customer_reviews.title: Keeps my hair totally dry!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap seems to be very well made, and best of all, it actually keeps my hair completely dry! All of my hair, even around the edges. Many caps I've tried have let some water in, but so far, I haven't had that problem with this one. It's also large enough to easily accommodate my hair in a bun or ponytail, but not overly large to the point that it's flopping around. The elastic keeps it in place very well, so it doesn't slide up or down. Overall, I'm very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I bought it because it looked like it would cover all thw baby hairs that the ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought it because it looked like it would cover all thw baby hairs that the other shower caps missed. This one has 2 elastics so it worked and my baby hairs are no longer uncovered and soaked after the shower. My only complaint is that the pink lining around the bottom edge tends to soak up water which is problematic because it makes the inside hair a little wet. It had a lot of room and poofs up leaving space for people with thick or long hair. Overall my hair seems to be more dry after using it compared to other shower caps, would recommend and buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Menza

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap covers my hair really well. I have long thick hair, and it works perfectly for me! After I use it, I leave it outside of the shower so it can air dry. It dries pretty fast! I read a few comments about mold but I think it’s because they’re not letting it air dry. I’ll try to provide an update after a few weeks but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Mayra Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry and lasts a long time
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! I've had this cap for almost a year and it still works as well as the day I got it. I never have to worry about fitting all my hair under as it is plenty big for it all. It has tight (but not too tight that it hurts) elastic so no water will get in. I like that it's lasted a long time. Just the other day was the first time I started to smell mildew, so I just threw it in the wash and it's back to perfect. 100% recommend
customer_reviews.author: Sarah R

customer_reviews.title: 2 thumbs up for this cap
customer_reviews.text: I have owned many shower caps and I like this one the best. It has very tight elastic which I like. My hair stays completely dry even around the nape of my neck. Its also roomy. I have long thick hair and i can place my bun anywhere on my head and the cap covers completely. With other caps I can only wear a low bun. Will be ordering another one for backup.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O.

customer_reviews.title: Too tight
customer_reviews.text: I’m an average heigh women with an average size head and I can’t wear this thing longer than 30 minutes without getting a headache because of how tight it is. I’m the kind of person who never gets headaches too. Also, I’ve noticed water gets in between the two layers, so it’s not water tight and therefore fairly prone to getting mold/mildew.
customer_reviews.author: George Castanza

customer_reviews.title: Fun showertime!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this shower cap is made and the decorative design of hairdryer ,purse,makeup bag etc. is cute! I have alot of hair so I needed a cap that fit it all inside. I would pay alittle more for a cloth liner . So while the steam/moisture in the bathroom after shower goes away . Doesn't make my hair frizzy . I would pay $1.50 more to have liner. But I am happy with it! Great price!
customer_reviews.author: b. barns

customer_reviews.title: Great shower cap overall
customer_reviews.text: The shower cap works perfectly fine, I’ve had mine for over a year now and it’s still working like the first day I bought it. The only thing is that it is kinda tight so even just taking it off right after the shower you’re gonna have a red tight mark on your forehead but it goes away in like an hour so no biggie. Also it does not get moldy but it does tend to smell like nasty after a long time. I tried washing it wit dish soap but the smell came back. People have been saying to put it in the washer with Clorox so I’ll try that next
customer_reviews.author: Ernesto Leal

customer_reviews.title: Terrible elastic band
customer_reviews.text: It slowly slips down my forehead until it presses down my eyebrows. It keeps the water off, but wow is it annoying.
customer_reviews.author: M. Russell

customer_reviews.title: This is great!
customer_reviews.text: I love this so much! My hair is dyed and I cannot wash it everyday. I have been using disposable shower caps but unfortunately they were too small so my hair would not fit completely into the shower caps. This one is huge! There's so much space for hair in there, and the band is nice and tight so no water will get in, and no hair will get out!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Schiff

customer_reviews.title: A Good Shower Cap
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a shower cap that will prevent your hair from getting wet - then this is a perfect cap! Keeps all my hair dry (apart from the baby hair that won't get in). Easy to put on and fits over my head with ample space if I had super thick/fluffy hair. I have super thin/straight/long hair and I'd like to say I have an average side head. The only complaint if any - The elastic is a little tight/itchy, so it does leave a mark on my forehead that goes away within minutes. I gave it a 4/5 on comfort because of this. Other than that - perfect cap!
customer_reviews.author: mara baker

customer_reviews.title: Great size, holds up for a long time.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one and the first didn’t need to be replaced for nearly two years. You won’t get that lifespan out of a drugstore shower cap. Love the excessively roomy cap. Way better than it not fitting over your ponytail and getting your hairline all wet. Yes it eventually got mildewy a couple times, but nothing that throwing it in a load of whites with bleach can’t fix. My need for replacing it was that the elastic finally wore out and it was no longer cinched around my head. Overall for a cheap piece of plastic this is more than you can ask for in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Much better than expected.
customer_reviews.text: Better than the 'bad' reviews! It's as if they received a totally different product. Thicker material than I have ever had-Maybe I have been buying the cheap ones. My hair, thick and waist long, fits EASILY underneath and is secure. Yes, I would buy again, if needed. This one makes it through the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn Dreams

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I put off buying a shower cap for a while, but decided to finally invest and this is worth every penny! It is tight to keep water out but not so tight that is squeezes your head. It has plenty of extra space for lots of hair. I have been using it for about two weeks and have had no issues. It drys quickly and is very cute!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Cute and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this shower cap because I don’t like the “plastic” look. It’s cute and soft. Waterproof and doesn’t make me sweaty. Elastic is a little tight and leaves a bit of a mark on my forehead but it’s not that serious, it’s usually gone by the time I finish my makeup.
customer_reviews.author: King in 4th

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I have machine washed this shower cap a few times, and it has held up so far! I have been using this pretty much every day and love it. The elastic is not too tight, which I like (disclaimer: I do have a small head). Definitely happy that I found this reusable shower cap.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: It fits my big noggin
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head and thick, long hair. It fit great, really covered what I need it to cover. It comes down on my forehead more than I expected, but have gotten used to it and just push it up when I need to wash my face. It's super bright and cherry. It's a nice quality too and doesn't have a weird plastic smell.
customer_reviews.author: Leticia

customer_reviews.title: Band broke after a few months of use
customer_reviews.text: Was great while it lasted. I bought this back in September and have been using it mostly every other day. Last week the band broke and now it is pretty much useless which is too bad because it worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: Satah

customer_reviews.title: Finally, a quality shower cap!
customer_reviews.text: Used it for the first time yesterday and I was very pleased. I have a lot of hair and it's very curly and this shower cap for all of my hair fit comfortably and still had room. It was snug around my head so no water got in. Glad I purchased!
customer_reviews.author: Brelanae

customer_reviews.title: Keeps water out and hair in.  Good job.
customer_reviews.text: Have long hair and it fits underneath with room to spare. Nice and tight so your hair doesn't fall out of the cap. I don't have a small head so I don't understand other reviews saying it is too small. The elastic is snug but I like that. My hair doesn't fall out and the water doesn't get in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Great material and fit! No mold!
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of those thin plastic caps from the stores that just rip or get moldy and you just keep having to buy new ones. I will have this cap for a very long time! Its thick/strudy and large size, so if you have long or a lot of hair, this will definitely accommodate. The elastic is not too tight and comfortable. The polka dot print is adorable. I’ve been using it for months with not a hint of mold/staining. I’ve read its washable which is a plus! No more crappy plastic caps for me!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Best durable cap I have ever bought
customer_reviews.text: I don't write a lot of reviews but I do write when I find a product exceptional. I love this shower cap. First it is so cute, adorable. And best of all it is very sturdy and I love the extra layer of elastic, really keeps the hair dry. I know this cap will last a long time. It may cost more than most caps you see in drugstore, etc, but it is well worth it. My last 2 caps only lasted a couple of months because the elastic stretches out and it is worthless. Totally will buy this product again, Already bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: GoMUtigers53

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice Quality
customer_reviews.text: I only wash my hair twice a week, so I needed something for the rest of the week to protect my hair from getting wet. This works great. I did have it hanging on the shower caddy, but it started to stink, so i started hanging it outside of the shower and it stopped stinking. It is pretty big, so it fits lots of hair. When i first got it, it kept slipping down my head, covering my eyes, but I'm able to pull it back down and not have it slide back down.
customer_reviews.author: samjane

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best products I've bought on Amazon. After buying several shower caps in various stores and being highly disappointed with the sizes, this is a winner. I have very long hair and a fairly large head and this cap does the job. The shape is wonderful, snug, but not uncomfortable; it keeps all my hair tucked in. And let's not forget how cute it is! I recommend it highly!
customer_reviews.author: stephanie

customer_reviews.title: Revamp Review
customer_reviews.text: Hi, this is a follow up review. Here is a mystery...I twist my hair and put the shower cap on my head. The elastic seems snug, there are no splits in the plastic, the shower nozzle is not overhead. When I remove the cap the back and right side of my hair is quite damp. Go figure. To the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Enteranet

customer_reviews.title: Works as it should
customer_reviews.text: It fit my head just fine but there was quite a lot of space left up top, which made my head look bigger (but who cares! nobody is gonna look at me when I shower). The elastic band was not too tight so it didn't hurt me. The water also didn't go in even after a few months of usage. However, the shower cap lost its elasticity and so I threw it away. I think for the price I paid for and for the period I used it. It was worth the money. So it's good.
customer_reviews.author: King of Minions

customer_reviews.title: Roomy enough for very long hair!!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair and this has room to spare, even with a clip in my hair. It has a tight fit so nothing slips, stays where you need it to stay. Very high quality materials, and it's cute! After my first shower with this it was the first time the hairline at the base of my neck wasn't wet; most caps slip or don't fit well. You could probably put this over hot rollers if you wanted. Really love this product!!
customer_reviews.author: BGuhl

customer_reviews.title: I like it fine and would order again
customer_reviews.text: This cap is shaped rather strangely, but works well. It is snug to your head, so with my very short hair I'm fine, but I don't see how anyone with long hair could use it. Maybe they could, but it just seems to fit me closely, and I have a pixie cut. It is not too tight on me, but I don't have a large head, so it does keep the water out well. It is made of a relatively thick material, so it doesn't feel chintzy. I like it fine and would order again.
customer_reviews.author: Speedy Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Not as big as I was hoping for, but I like it.
customer_reviews.text: I do wish it were a little bigger. I think I have a large head and I definitely have a lot of hair. It does fit and the size is fine, but I was expecting and hoping for more room. I'm very sensitive, so I was worried the elastic would be too tight based on the comments. Overall it's not too tight, but the elastic can hurt my earlobes if they're not tucked in enough, which is easy to fix.
customer_reviews.author: J. H.

customer_reviews.title: Does the job...
customer_reviews.text: This hat was a bit smaller than I had hoped for, I have very thick long hair. However, that being said, it did cover everything at the hairline all the way around the head. It would have been more comfortable if it had been a bit larger. Overall it was a good purchase and I am satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and works great
customer_reviews.text: I have fine hair, but a lot of it, and I’m pretty happy with this. I tie my hair up first so I don’t have to end up trying to shove it up underneath the elastic. The double elastic really helps to keep the cap in place so it doesn’t ride up. The only place my hair ever gets a little wet is the bottom of my hairline in back, and that only happens occasionally. I will buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: Tweety Bird

customer_reviews.title: Smells of Mildew
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Cute, keeps hair dry, holds medium length hair well, not expensive Cons: After about 4 months, this cap started to smell pretty strongly of mildew. I washed it in my washing machine like suggested by other reviewers, and it went back to smelling nice. However, the smell came back after only about 2 more weeks. I've never had this issue with other brands of shower caps. But, it is a very low cost item, so even if you ordered a new one every 4 months, it would only be about $20 a year, so I guess you can consider that too.
customer_reviews.author: Trying to Help

customer_reviews.title: Cute like a cupcake
customer_reviews.text: This cap is ridiculous and awesome. I seldom enjoy a few minutes of quiet time to myself, indulging alone in a hot bath. When anyone from my family decides to pop in to interrupt me, they take one look at my ridiculous cupcake hat and back out of the bathroom. This shower cap says I mean business and to leave Grandma alone. If you have a rough day, just put this shower cap on, take one look at yourself in the mirror before you get into shower or tub and you will have something to smile about. Also does a great job at keeping your hair dry, durable product.
customer_reviews.author: Margie Bowling

customer_reviews.title: A little tight
customer_reviews.text: This is what I was looking for and kind of cute!! It is a little tight around the head (leaves a red mark on my forehead) and does let a little water seep through (My hairline on my forehead and back of my neck sometimes gets a little wet). Overall, does the job and keeps a majority of my hair dry on days where I don't need to wash my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 1 year usage
customer_reviews.text: Worked for me a year to the day and then the elastic lost its elasticity. I even put it through the washer once to get the smell out of the inside portion and it held up for amount a month more. Over that year I used it for ever single shower. Won't last you a life time but it'll last you a while.
customer_reviews.author: Nameless

customer_reviews.title: Durable but gets smelly
customer_reviews.text: Very durable. My only complaint is that it smells like mold after a couple of uses. Tried to spray alcohol on it, tried washing it in soap, nothing works. Once it gets wet, it gets smelly again, not sure what to do with it.
customer_reviews.author: Bai

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Cap
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair and this is best the shower cap I've ever had. It covers all of the hair and it's easy to get on. My only complaint is it is a hair tighter than I would like. It hurts if you wear it for a while because of how tight it is. Nonetheless, it's still the best cap I've ever come across.
customer_reviews.author: SomeoneOutThere

customer_reviews.title: Great for overnight oil treatments
customer_reviews.text: I like to soak my hair in coconut oil overnight once a month. This was great for keeping in the oil because of the waterproof lining inside. I still laid down towels just in case, but in the past when I used to just use a plastic bag I’d get oil all over this place. This was much better. Slightly itchy around the ears
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good shower cap
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this cap a lot. It does slide down my forehead and over my eyes if I don’t keep it up higher. But more importantly, this really keeps the water off my hair and it has not gotten smelly like other caps I’ve had.
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: I love it!💗
customer_reviews.text: This is the best shower cap ever!!!!! Nice and snug on my head. No water leaks through. Dries nicely for the next day. The polka dots are adorable, and this cap is very roomy. I have long hair, so I can roll it in a big bun with a claw clip and it'd still fit in the cap. I'll definitely buy this again. I bought this new one to replace the one I got last year. This shower cap lasted 15 months! Till the inner elastic got worn out. I love this shower cap.
customer_reviews.author: Himesama808

customer_reviews.title: Love these Betty Shower Caps
customer_reviews.text: I use a shower cap four or five times a week. These are my favorite, comfortable, stays on and easy to dry. Worth the few extra dollars.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Andrew

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect for that
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to wear on the mornings I need to shower but don't need to wash my hair. It is perfect for that. Not cheap feeling. Good quality. Very stretchy so if you have your hair done it has some play for you to wear the cap.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Pickard

product_meta.title: Betty Dain Fashionista Collection Mold Resistant Lined Shower Cap, Waterproof Exterior, PEVA Lining, Mold and Mildew Resistant, Oversized Design for All Hair Lengths, Elasticized Hem, Deco Dots
product_meta.description: Color:Deco DotsThe Betty Dain Fashionista Collection of stylish shower caps offer a soft, waterproof nylon exterior with a mold-resistant, PEVA lining. It provides the perfect combination of style, comfort, and quality. The Fashionista Collection shower caps feature an oversized design perfect for thick or long hair. They're accented with stylish ruching and trimmed in colorful satin with a matching bow. Choose from a fun variety of patterns to match your style and personality.
feature_bullets: ECO-FRIENDLY VINYL ALTERNATIVE: The Betty Dain Fashionista Collection of stylish shower caps offers a soft, waterproof design made from mold-resistant frosted PEVA, an alternative to vinyl.
OVERSIZED FOR MORE HAIR: Mold and mildew resistant, this shower cap provides the perfect combination of style, comfort, and quality in an oversized style perfect for thick or long hair.
FOR PLENTY OF PERSONALITY: Our Fashionista Shower Caps are accented with colorful contrasting lace trim around the comfortable elasticized hem. Choose from 4 patterns to match your personality.

TOOLS FOR MODERN ARTISTS: Innovation is the Stamp of Betty Dain. Current with the latest trends, Betty Dain designs and manufactures stylish salon apparel and hair color accessories that cater to the functionality and fashion preferences for todays hair professional.
LISTENING TO YOUR NEEDS: Designed and manufactured by Betty Dain, which has listened to the needs of the hair industry and created high-quality solutions for over 60 years.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S.
